pufferlib.emulation module#

class pufferlib.emulation.Postprocessor(env)#

Bases: object

Base class for user-defined featurizers and postprocessors

Instantiated per agent or team

Provides full access to the underlying environment

reset(obs)#

Called at the beginning of each episode

features(obs)#

Called on each observation after it is returned by the environment

actions(actions)#

Called on each action before it is passed to the environment

rewards_dones_infos(rewards, dones, infos)#

Called on each reward, done, and info after they are returned by the environment

class pufferlib.emulation.BasicPostprocessor(env)#

Bases: Postprocessor

Basic postprocessor that injects returns and lengths information into infos and provides an option to pad to a maximum episode length. Works for single-agent and team-based multi-agent environments

Provides full access to the underlying environment

reset(obs)#

Called at the beginning of each episode

rewards_dones_infos(rewards, dones, infos)#

Called on each reward, done, and info after they are returned by the environment

actions(actions)#

Called on each action before it is passed to the environment

features(obs)#

Called on each observation after it is returned by the environment
